survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Smart Kitchen Appliances Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences and satisfaction levels regarding smart kitchen appliances to inform product development and marketing strategies.

questions.question_text: Which of the following smart kitchen appliances do you currently own?
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes to allow multiple selections. Ensure the 'None of the above' option is clearly visible.

script.question_text: Which of the following smart kitchen appliances do you currently own?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your smart kitchen appliances?
questions.routing_logic: Show if Q1 does not select 'None of the above'
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Include an optional comment field for detailed feedback.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your smart kitchen appliances?
script.routing_logic: Show if Q1 does not select 'None of the above'

questions.question_text: What features do you value the most in smart kitchen appliances?
answer_options: Integration with other smart home devices
questions.client_notes: Allow respondents to select up to three features to prioritize.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with max selections set to 3.

script.question_text: What features do you value the most in smart kitchen appliances?
answer_options: Integration with other smart home devices

questions.question_text: What is the primary reason you would consider purchasing a smart kitchen appliance in the future?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended text field to capture diverse responses.

script.question_text: What is the primary reason you would consider purchasing a smart kitchen appliance in the future?

questions.question_text: How important is the brand reputation when purchasing smart kitchen appliances?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency.
